title: Investigate remaining 521 UBS critical issues - focus on security vulnerabilities

title: Fix timing attack vulnerability in login authentication flow

close_reason: CRITICAL security vulnerability fixed. Replaced hardcoded admin email domain check with secure environment-based admin whitelist system. Added proper audit logging and documentation.

close_reason: CRITICAL security vulnerability fixed. Removed hardcoded JWT secret fallback and implemented mandatory JWT_SECRET validation on startup. Application now fails securely if proper JWT secret is not configured.
